p.k: Charlie meets a creature just like him named Ralph. / The Bears have a relaxing day at the spa. Grizz tries to get everything the spa has to offer. Panda gets trapped in the steam room with an old man. And Ice Bear plays ping pong. / To help raise money to save Darrell's store, the Bears use the stack as a taxi through a ride share app. / The Baby Bears sign up for a game of laser tag.
